oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Centennial celebrations; Exhibitions; Fairs; Gazebos; Bands; Bandstands
Tennessee Centennial and International Exposition (1897 : Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Black and white photograph showing the Tennessee Centennial Exposition bandstand. In the background is the Rialto.
The bandstand was used for outdoor concerts at the exposition. Outdoor music, along with military orchestras, was very popular during the late 19th century.
